overview: Filmmaker Joan Churchill, who is being honored this year with DOC NYC’s Lifetime Achievement  Award, collaborates with Alan Barker on this personal portrait of legendary filmmakers Haskell Wexler, D.A. Pennebaker and Chris Hegedus. Over a rollicking evening, they discuss filmmaking and what it means to be an artist, interwoven with reflections on Wexler’s work as an activist.
title: Shoot from the Heart
